LanguageData.RC2_BrewingSpot.label: brewing spot
LanguageData.RC2_BrewingSpot.description: A place for preparing the precursors for some simple kinds of alcohol.
LanguageData.RC2_ElectricBrewery.label: electric brewery
LanguageData.RC2_ElectricBrewery.description: A work station with all the equipment needed to mix wort, mash, and must for alcohol production. Powered version improved performance.
LanguageData.RC2_ElectricDistiller.label: electric distiller
LanguageData.RC2_ElectricDistiller.description: A set of equipment required for the distillation of spirits and liquors. Prone to exploding when damaged thanks to the alcohol vapor that is usually present. Powered by electricity.
LanguageData.RC2_Distiller.label: distiller
LanguageData.RC2_Distiller.description: A set of wood-fueled equipment required for the distillation of spirits and liquors. Prone to exploding when damaged thanks to the alcohol vapor that is usually present. Built sturdier than its electrically-powered cousin.
LanguageData.RC2_WineFermentingBarrel.label: wine fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_WineFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting grape must into wine.
LanguageData.RC2_AleFermentingBarrel.label: ale fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_AleFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting wheat wort into ale.
LanguageData.RC2_StoutFermentingBarrel.label: stout fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_StoutFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting oat wort into stout.
LanguageData.RC2_CiderFermentingBarrel.label: cider fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_CiderFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting apple must into cider.
LanguageData.RC2_MeadFermentingBarrel.label: mead fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_MeadFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting honey must into mead.
LanguageData.RC2_FruitWineFermentingBarrel.label: fruit wine fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_FruitWineFermentingBarrel.descriptio: A barrel for fermenting fruit must into fruit wine.
LanguageData.RC2_SakeFermentingBarrel.label: sake fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_SakeFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting rice mash into sake.
LanguageData.RC2_TequilaFermentingBarrel.label: tequila fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_TequilaFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting raw agaves into agave mosto, which then needs distillation afterwards.
LanguageData.RC2_VodkaFermentingBarrel.label: vodka fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_VodkaFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting raw potatoes into potato mash, which then requires distillation into vodka.
LanguageData.RC2_RumFermentingBarrel.label: rum fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_RumFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting raw sugarcane into sugarcane wort, which then needs distillation into rum.
LanguageData.RC2_GinFermentingBarrel.label: gin fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_GinFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for 'marinating' gin precursor made from juniper berries and vodka into gin. Just needs a few days for the vodka to properly absorb the flavor.
LanguageData.RC2_WhiskeyFermentingBarrel.label: whiskey fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_WhiskeyFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting raw corn into corn mash, which then needs distillation into whiskey.
LanguageData.RC2_AmbrosiaFermentingBarrel.label: ambrosia fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_AmbrosiaFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting ambrosia must into ambrosia nectar. Takes a full year to ferment.
LanguageData.RC2_KumisFermentingBarrel.label: kumis fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_KumisFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting kumis must into kumis.
LanguageData.RC2_ArrackFermentingBarrel.label: arrack fermenting barrel
LanguageData.RC2_ArrackFermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting coconuts into coconut wort, which then requires distillation into arrack.
